info.title: Banana Banana Bread
info.description: This banana bread recipe creates the most delicious, moist loaf with loads of banana flavor. Why compromise the banana flavor? Friends and family love my recipe and say it's by far the best! It tastes wonderful toasted. Enjoy!

directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt in large bowl #1
Beat brown sugar and butter with an electric mixer in large bowl #2 until smooth
Stir eggs and mashed bananas into bowl #2 until well blended
Stir bowl #2 into bowl #1 until just combined
Pour batter into the prepared loaf pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean - about 60 minutes.
Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack to cool completely.
